organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The former Nascar driver Jeremy Mayfield, barred since 2009 for a failed drug test, was arrested at his home in Catawba, N.C., on Tuesday night and charged with possession of one and a half grams of methamphetamine.
